title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra**

**Product Description:**

Experience comfort and confidence with our Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, designed specifically for plus-size women. This full-coverage bra offers wireless support and features a beautiful leopard satin print.

**Key Features:**

* Available in sizes 32C-50DD for a comfortable fit
* Adjustable front straps for customized support
* Made from a soft and breathable blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex
* Includes 1 everyday bra and 1 satin bra in the pack
* Features a wide band for added support and rows of hook and eye closures for a secure fit
* Wireless design provides all-day comfort without the wire

**Style Details:**

* Leopard print design with white, nude, and other color options
* Full coverage for modesty and support
* Front adjustable straps for easy adjustments

**What's Included:**

* 1 x Wireless Bra in Leopard Satin Print

**Order now and experience the comfort and confidence of our Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack!**

**Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra**

**Get comfortable and confident with our wireless bra pack!**

This full-coverage wireless bra pack is designed to provide ultimate comfort and support for plus-size women. Made from a soft and breathable blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra is perfect for everyday wear.

**Key Features:**

* Full coverage design for maximum comfort and support
* Wireless support with a wide band for added comfort
* Hook and eye closures for easy on and off
* Adjustable front straps for a customizable fit
* Leopard satin print with white, nude, and other color options

* 1 wireless bra with satin finish
* Everyday bra design perfect for daily wear

**Size Range:**

* Available in sizes 32C to 50DD

**Material:**

* 90% nylon, 10% spandex for a soft and breathable fit

**Why Choose This Bra?**

* Comfortable wireless design for a relaxed fit

* Adjustable straps for a customizable fit
* Leopard satin print adds a touch of style to your everyday look

**Order now and experience the comfort and confidence of our Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack!**
